hero.title: Predictable growth starts here
hero.subtitle: FM Compta Consulting accompanies you in managing your accounting for sustainable and controlled growth of your business.

about.title: About us
about.description: FM Compta Consulting is your trusted partner in accounting and financial consulting. We transform your data into concrete business results.

accounting.title: General Accounting
accounting.description: Complete management of your accounting, from invoice entry to tax declarations, including the annual balance sheet.

tax.title: Tax Consulting
tax.description: Legal tax optimization, strategic planning and support in your tax declarations.

social.title: Social Management
social.description: Administration of salaries, social declarations and management of legal obligations related to personnel.

creation.title: Business Creation
creation.description: Support in business creation procedures, choice of legal structure and business plan.
